search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as counter where `telegraf_index` metric_name=net.packets_recv host=* by interface span=1s | streamstats current=f last(counter) as counter_prev by interface | eval packets_recv=((counter-counter_prev)) | where NOT (packets_recv<0) | timechart useother=f limit=45 minspan=1m bins=1000 sum(packets_recv) as packets_recv by interface
